title: ‘Most boring stage at the Tour de France’: Chats, naps, crashes, and relegations
content:
The irony is that quite a bit happened in the four-hour snoozer, but all it was packed into the final chaotic 10km.

Read the full article at ‘Most boring stage at the Tour de France’: Chats, naps, crashes, and relegations on Velo.
author: ahood
